name: 148 Agency
description:
The 148 Agency was born in 2007 in a tropical jungle populated by strange animals.
Consultants, UI / UX designer, social media managers, graphic designers, web designer, developers, editors, editors 2.0. Whether you are an SME or a large account, 148 Agency puts at your disposal its team of enthusiasts in digital communication, as well as its ecosystem of tested and approved partners, to bring you creative and innovative solutions: think and create.
